value.0: What would you like to do?
Type the symbol into chat and press ok. If the symbol is a double-quote it will be reversed to denote speech rather then emotes.
Choose your preferred Combat Style. Mind that you need to have the ACP override to make this work. You can get it at our website (www.amiaworld.net/acp).

So you like pain, huh?

1 = take one hp
2 = take all but one hp
3 = take d6 hp
4 = take d10 hp
5 = take d20 hp
6 = take d100 hp
7 = take 25% of current hp
8 = take 50% of current hp
9 = take 75% of current hp
The following options change what kind of creature you summon using the Epic Mummy Dust spell.

The following options change what kind of creature you summon using the Summon Creature I-IX spells.

<StartAction>(Note that if you're Neutral and a non-nature class, you are able to choose either Celestial or Fiendish, but once only! After that, the choice is locked to your character.)</Start>
Which action do you like to perform?
Toggle off usable for all Job System Placables
Change the symbol I denote emotes with [...]
<StartAction>Demon Blade</Start> Style - 1-Handed weapons or dual-wield.  Humans only!
<StartAction>Fencing</Start> Style - Swashbucking sword style.  Not good for 2-handed weapons or polearms.
Gimme quite a bit of random pain.
Disembowel me with a rabid duck!
Nah... not really. Use a feather, please.
Turn my collision bubble off, please!
